title: simplehuman wall mounted sensor mirror: lighted makeup & vanity mirror
description: Our wall mount sensor mirror lights up automatically as your face approaches. Its tru-lux light system simulates natural sunlight, allowing you to see full color variation, so you'll know when your makeup is color-correct and flawless. The distortion-free 5x magnification mirror provides exceptional detail while still allowing you to see your entire face at once. Installs easily into the wall like a standard towel bar.

transcripts: this is the wall mount sensor mirror. it's smart. it lights up automatically as your approach and shuts off when you walk away it's also brighter clearer and more color correct than normal mirrors. more than twice as bright as the next best while closely simulating natural sunlight for true-to-life color-correct detail. it recharges with standard USB so there are no messy chordsto keep plugged in and hang down your wall. it has a sturdy telescopic swing arm that extends and adjust smoothly and you'll never have to change a bulb because the leds will last a lifetime. the five-time magnification gives you every detail while still showing your entire face at once. it's easy to look good with our sensor mirror.
